1 namespace Fasetto.Word
2 {
3  using System;
4  using System.Diagnostics;
5  using System.Globalization;
6  using Fasetto.Word.Core;
7 
8  /// <summary>
9  /// Convert an <see cref="ApplicationPage"/> to value of a Page
10  /// </summary>
11  public class ApplicationPageValueConverter : BaseValueConverter<ApplicationPageValueConverter>
12  {
13  #region Public Methods
14 
15  /// <inheritdoc/>
16  /// <summary>
17  /// Convert an <see cref="T:Fasetto.Word.ApplicationPage"/> to an <see
18  /// cref="T:System.Object"/> containing the actual PageValue
19  /// </summary>
20  /// <param name="value">The <see cref="T:Fasetto.Word.ApplicationPage"/> value to convert</param>
21  /// <param name="targetType">The <see cref="T:System.Type"/> to convert to</param>
22  /// <param name="parameter">Any parameter passed through</param>
23  /// <param name="culture">The language <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo"/>.</param>
24  /// <returns>The <see cref="T:System.Object"/> containing an actual page.</returns>
25  public override object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)
26  {
27  if (value != null)
28  switch ((ApplicationPage)value)
29  {
30  case ApplicationPage.Login:
31  return new LoginPage();
32 
33  case ApplicationPage.Chat:
34  return new ChatPage();
35 
36  case ApplicationPage.Register:
37  return new RegisterPage();
38 
39  default:
40  Debugger.Break();
41  return null;
42  }
43  else
44  {
45  return null;
46  }
47  }
48 
49  /// <summary>
50  /// (Not implemented!) Convert the page back to an <see cref="ApplicationPage"/>.
51  /// </summary>
52  /// <param name="value">The page to convert back.</param>
53  /// <param name="targetType">The <see cref="Type"/> to convert back to</param>
54  /// <param name="parameter">Any parameter passed through</param>
55  /// <param name="culture">The language <see cref="CultureInfo"/>.</param>
56  /// <returns>An <see cref="ApplicationPage"/> value.</returns>
57  /// <exception cref="NotImplementedException">
58  /// We don't need this function, thus its not implemented.
59  /// </exception>
60  public override object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)
61  {
62  throw new NotImplementedException();
63  }
64 
65  #endregion Public Methods
66  }
67 }
